meanings.sent1: The plasticized toy had a shiny surface.
meanings.sent2: The plasticized cup was durable and easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: The plasticized bag crinkled loudly with every movement.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a plasticized mask, hiding her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The plasticized coating on the book made it waterproof and long-lasting.

meanings.definition: Made flexible or moldable by adding plasticizers
meanings.sent1: The plasticized dough was easy to shape into different forms.
meanings.sent2: The plasticized material could be stretched without tearing.
meanings.sent3: The plasticized rubber band bounced around the room uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as plasticized as clay, ready to be molded into any direction.
meanings.sent5: The plasticized fabric draped elegantly, conforming to the body's curves.
